00057         static X509* readX509(const UString& x, const char* format = 0);

00059         UCertificate(const UString& x, const char* format = 0)
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCertificate, "%.*S,%S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x), format)
00062 
00063                 x509 = readX509(x, format);
00064                 }

00070         void clear()
00071                 {
00072                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::clear()")
00073 
00074                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(x509)
00075 
00076                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(X509_free, "%p", x509);
00077 
00078                 x509 = 0;
00079                 }
00080 
00081         ~UCertificate()
00082                 {
00083                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCertificate)
00084 
00085                 if (x509) clear();
00086                 }

00091                 {
00092                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::isValid()")
00093

00095                 }

00097         bool isSelfSigned() const { return isIssued(*this); }

00101         void set(X509* px509)
00102                 {
00103                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::set(%p)", px509)
00104 
00105                 if (isValid()) clear();
00106 
00107                 if (x509) x509 = X509_dup(px509);
00108                 }

00115                 {
00116                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::duplicate()")
00117

00119                 }

00157                 {
00158                 U_TRACE(1, "UCertificate::getIssuer(%p,%b)", x509, ldap)
00159 
00160                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(x509)
00161 
00162                 X509_NAME* n = (X509_NAME*) U_SYSCALL(X509_get_issuer_name, "%p", x509);
00163 
00164                 return getName(n, ldap);

00296                 {

00298 
00299                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(a)
00300

00312 #ifdef HAVE_OPENSSL_98
00313         static bool matchPrivateKey(X509* a, EVP_PKEY* privateKey)
00314                 {
00315                 U_TRACE(1, "UCertificate::matchPrivateKey(%p,%p)", a, privateKey)
00316 
00317                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(a)
00318 
00319                 EVP_PKEY* publicKey = (EVP_PKEY*) U_SYSCALL(X509_get_pubkey, "%p", a);
00320 
00321                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(EVP_PKEY_cmp, "%p,%p", publicKey, privateKey) == 1);
00322 
00323                 U_RETURN(result);
00324                 }
00325 
00326         bool matchPrivateKey(EVP_PKEY* privateKey) const { return matchPrivateKey(x509, privateKey); }
00327 #endif

00363         bool checkValidity() const
00364                 {
00365                 U_TRACE(1, "UCertificate::checkValidity()")
00366 
00367                 (void) U_SYSCALL(gettimeofday, "%p,%p", &u_now, 0);
00368 
00369                 bool result = checkValidity(u_now.tv_sec);
00370 
00371                 U_RETURN(result);
00372                 }
00373 
00378         bool checkValidity(time_t time) const
00379                 {
00380                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::checkValidity(%ld)", time)
00381 
00382                 /*
00383                 Not Before: Jan 25 11:54:00 2005 GMT                                                                                         
00384                 Not After : Jan 25 11:54:00 2006 GMT                                                                                         
00385                 */
00386 
00387                 bool result = (time >= UDate::getSecondFromTime(getNotBefore(), true, "%s %2d %2d:%2d:%2d %4d GMT") &&
00388                                                         time <= UDate::getSecondFromTime(getNotAfter(),  true, "%s %2d %2d:%2d:%2d %4d GMT"));
00389 
00390                 U_RETURN(result);
00391                 }
00392 
00397         bool verify(EVP_PKEY* publicKey) const
00398                 {
00399                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::verify(%p)", publicKey)
00400 
00401                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(x509)
00402 
00403                 if (U_SYSCALL(X509_verify, "%p,%p", x509, publicKey) <= 0) U_RETURN(false);
00404 
00405                 U_RETURN(true);
00406                 }

00455         static void setForLog(X509* a, UString& buffer, const char* fmt = " (\"%.*s\",\"%ld\")")
00456                 {
00457                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::setForLog(%p,%p,%S)", a, &buffer, fmt)
00458 
00459                 UString issuer = getIssuer(a, true);
00460 
00461                 buffer.snprintf_add(fmt, U_STRING_TO_TRACE(issuer), getSerialNumber(a));
00462                 }

00464         void setForLog(UString& buffer, const char* fmt = " (\"%.*s\",\"%ld\")") const { setForLog(x509, buffer, fmt); }

00468         static bool isEqual(X509* a, X509* b)
00469                 {
00470                 U_TRACE(0, "UCertificate::isEqual(%p,%p)", a, b)
00471 
00472                 int rc = U_SYSCALL(X509_cmp, "%p,%p", a, b);
00473 
00474                 U_RETURN(rc == 0);
00475                 }
00476 
00477         bool operator==(const UCertificate& c) const { return  isEqual(x509, c.x509); }
00478         bool operator!=(const UCertificate& c) const { return !isEqual(x509, c.x509); }
